page.title: 12FARMING (1)
page.content: There are a number of different types of farm in the area. Burling Brothers Farm is a{mixed farm}of 300 acres with 42 beef cattle and a variety of crops - winter wheat for animal feed and flour, winter barley for pig feed, spring barley for malt and oil seed rape for vegetable oil. Garners{Fruit Farm}has 15 acres growing apples, pears and plums. Bramley apples are sold to Lyons cakes.Wheat is also grown on 45 acres. Albany Farm is a 150 acre{cereal and {dairy farm,}potatoes and wheat being{ for commercial use.Barley is grown for animal feed.Rare breeds of English Whites and pedigree Herefords are bred for showing and selling whilst crossbreds are aimed at the beef market.
